verses.roman:
mora yata kārya-kāma, saba kailā nāśa
ki tomāra hṛdaye āche, kaha mora pāśa

synonyms: mora—my; yata—all; kārya-kāma—occupational duties; saba—everything; kailā nāśa—you have spoiled; ki—what; tomāra—your; hṛdaye—within the heart; āche—there is; kaha—kindly tell; mora pāśa—to me.
translation: "You have spoiled all my activities. What is your intention? Please tell me frankly."
